document_title: CI Group - Clients Section (User Story Driven)
summary: User story: As a prospective client, I want to reach the Clients section via About Us so I can see the brands CI Group works with.

user_stories.i_want: to view the Clients section by navigating from the homepage to About Us
user_stories.so_that: I can confirm which brands CI Group works with before engaging sales
acceptance_criteria: About Us is reachable from the homepage navigation without search.
Clients section is reachable from About Us (anchor or in-page content).
Clients section displays visible client names/logos or copy describing clients.

test_cases.title: User story US-CI-CLIENTS-001: Navigate to About Us and view Clients section
steps: Act as a prospective client on https://www.cigroup.co.uk and arrive on the homepage.
From the primary navigation, open the About Us page.
Scroll or navigate within About Us to the Clients section/content.
Confirm the Clients section shows client names/logos or descriptive copy.
test_cases.expected_result: Clients section content is visible from the About Us path, satisfying the user story acceptance criteria.
